descriptionHtml:
This is a global mod on Skyrim, adding new, giant location, based on Gothic 1.The mod was created by independent group of modders, but unfortunately abandoned. There might be a lot of fans of Gothic and Skyrim on Nexus, who might want to finish this mod. Everyone is author, do what ever you want. 

If you are interested, the creators are now working on a separate game inspired by Gothic 1 on Unreal Engine. And it is awesome!

Q: "How to get into location?"
A: "You might start a new game and follow after an imperial guy. In the first room, in the corner you will see a door, this door is the portal into Gothic location."
Kind regards!
